original:
Recent criticism of major digital platforms has centered on concerns regarding their size, power, and impact on competition, democracy, and user well-being. Notably, issues have arisen in the context of events such as the alleged Russian interference in the 2016 U.S. presidential election, which has raised questions about the role of these platforms in democratic processes.
